trans-unit.source: Provides a calendar adapter class for the WML device adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供 WML 裝置配接器集的行事曆配接器類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The WML calendar adapter uses secondary UI features to render a calendar control over multiple screens.
trans-unit.target: WML 行事曆配接器會使用第二個 UI 功能，來呈現多個螢幕上的行事曆控制項。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlCalendarAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlCalendarAdapter" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回關聯控制項的強型別參考。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 關聯控制項的強型別參考。

trans-unit.source: Name of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the event was handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已處理，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已處理，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current view state.
trans-unit.target: 目前的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Loads the view state.
trans-unit.target: 載入檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: An object (defined by <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />) that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: (由 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 所定義的) 物件，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called after an object, such as a form or a page, is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 物件 (例如表單或頁面) 初始化之後呼叫。

trans-unit.source: An object (defined by <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />) that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: (由 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 所定義的) 物件，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Loads data that pertains to a control, a page, or a device adapter.
trans-unit.target: 載入與控制項、頁面或裝置配接器有關的資料。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.target: (由 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 所定義的) 物件，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called by the control's OnPreRender method, to perform adapter-specific work prior to rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由控制項的 OnPreRender 方法呼叫，以便在呈現之前執行配接器特定工作。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: The text writer to receive output.
trans-unit.target: 要接收輸出的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Generates the target-specific markup for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 為相關聯的控制項產生目標特定的標記。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the control saves its private view state.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項儲存其私用檢視狀態時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Null" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="Null" />。
